lines.text:
[as undercover cop, pulling a gun from her garter on an armed pimp in a potential shootout]
Blink your eyes, motherfucker, and you die in the dark!
Make your move, and make my day!
Jesus, man the wombats are out tonight. I mean whores, faggots, pimps. And hustlers, junkies, drag queens and freaks man! This city sucks!
Let me see a warrant right now boy.
Warrants? We don't need no stinkin' warrants because we're holding them in our right hand, buffalo breath!
